item.description:
Our Secret Santa Paws celebration will include Pot Luck food and gifts for the puppies.

See the Forum thread for all the details on the planning of this event.

IMPORTANT
The Secret Santa Paws gift exchange enrollment period ended 11/30/08. However, you can still sign up for the party. HO, HO, HO!!!

Secret Santa Paws gift exchange: We are suggesting a $20 limit for the gift purchase.

NOTE: Directions from Mapquest and Google maps are inaccurate after you exit Rte 93 at exit 2. Follow these instead.

FOOD
If you bring an electrical appliance like a crockpot, bring a long extension cord as well.

Potluck Food & Beverage List and Participant Bringing that Item:



  • Paper Plates, Cups, Napkins, Forks, Knives and Spoons = Plunk
  • Doggie Treats and Container = Plunk
  • Cake = Judi
  • Homemade soup/chowder and fresh bread/ crackers = Jennifer
  • Vegetarian chili = Joan
  • Sour Cream Coffee Cake = Adele
  • Pocket appetizers --Spanikopita, mushroom and cheese = Austen and Cooper (Leisel)
  • Coffee Urn = Leisel
  • Mini Quiche = Carolyn
  • American Chop Suey = Kaitlin and Dave
  • Sweet & Sour Kielbasa & other sausage = Hugo & Christine
  • Finger sandwiches = Liz & Barney
  • Mexican dip with chips = Tina
  • Cookies or Cupcakes = Diana and Nanook of the North
  • And More Cookies of Course = Colleen and Goldie
  • Sodas and Apple Cider = Stephanie
  • Homemade Chocolate Fudge = Linda and Buddy Boy
  • Chinese Cold Sesame Noodles = Linda and Tanner
  • Pumpkin Pie = Al and Bella
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Company Name A & R Sawyer on the billboard

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH
